entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
